Nerangs.ab: aēsmąsca baōiδīmca ... ratufritīmca yazamaide ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhəṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaθrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide xšnūman ān ī bēd guftan ka xšnūman ardā fraward bēd aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi yazamaide tā vīspā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō aṣ̌āunąm yazamaide ka gāhānbār bēd ka aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa maiδiiōi.zarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ayāb ān gāh ī bēd pas aēsmąsca baōiδīmca ... ratufritīmca yazamaide ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide agar gāh dudīgar bēd guftan

"At aēsmąsca baōiδīmca ... ratufritīmca yazamaide ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhəṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaθrā huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide, they should recite the corresponding šnūman. When it is for Ardā Fraward, (they should recite) aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi yazamaide until vīspā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō aṣ̌āunąm yazamaide. When it is a gāhānbār, when (they have said) aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa maiδiiōi.zarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide or the corresponding gāh, then (they should recite) aēsmąsca baōiδīmca ... ratufritīmca yazamaide ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa hāuuanīm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamide maiδiiōizarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide and, when it is another gāh , (they should say it)."

aēsmąsca baōiδīmca ... ratufritīmca yazamaide yazišn gāhānbār ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa maiδiiōi.zarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide agar ahlawān bēd aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi yazamaide tā gyāg aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide

"At aēsmąsca baōiδīmca ... ratufritīmca yazamaide, (when it is) a liturgy for Gāhānbār, (they should recite) ratauuō vīspe mazišta yazamaide aiiara asńiia māhiia yāiriia sarəδa maiδiiōi.zarəmaēm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide. If it is for the ahlawān, (they should recite) aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi yazamaide until aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide."
